premiumTier.label: Premium Tier
premiumTier.benefit1: Full HR system with team management

facilityAccessChoice.profileRequirement: Complete your facility profile to access either tier
facilityAccessChoice.mandatoryFields: All fields in Facility Details, Legal, Billing, and Settings (including Opening Hours) must be completed

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your personal and professional information

profile.tabSavedMovingToNext: Changes saved! Moving to the next section.

profile.errorDeletingAccount: Error deleting your account. Please try again.

subscription.title: Subscription Plan
subscription.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs
subscription.unlockPremiumFeatures: Unlock all premium features for enhanced experience

restartTutorial.title: Unlock Full Access
restartTutorial.message: To unlock all features (work independently, do replacements, access all profile sections), you need to complete the full tutorial.
restartTutorial.note: Your current progress will be saved. You can continue from where you left off.

errors.loadingConfig: Error loading profile configuration. Please refresh the page.
errors.accessDenied: Access denied. You don't have permission to view this profile.
errors.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to perform this action

accountBasics.title: Account Basics & Security
accountBasics.subtitle: Manage your account identity, login, and security settings.
accountBasics.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
accountBasics.deleteWarning: Warning: This action cannot be undone.
accountBasics.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This will:
accountBasics.deleteEffect2: Delete your profile from our system
accountBasics.deleteEffect3: Cancel any active applications or contracts
accountBasics.deleteEffect4: Permanently remove access to your account
accountBasics.reauthenticateMessage: For security reasons, please confirm your password before deleting your account.
accountBasics.reauthenticateMessageGoogle: Please confirm the deletion of your account.
accountBasics.googleAuthMessage: You are logged in with Google. Password change is not available.

errors.passwordChangeFailed: Failed to change password. Please try again.

accountBasics.discardChanges: Are you sure you want to discard your changes?
accountBasics.deleteWarningPermanent: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
accountBasics.deleteConfirmationDetails: Please read the following information carefully before confirming:
accountBasics.reauthenticateMessageGoogleDelete: For security reasons, you'll need to sign in with Google again to confirm account deletion.
accountBasics.reauthenticateMessagePasswordDelete: For security reasons, please confirm your password before deleting your account.

errors.newPasswordTooShort: New password must be at least 6 characters
errors.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 2MB

accountBasics.2faIsEnabledMessage: Two-factor authentication is enabled for your account
accountBasics.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data

personalDetails.title: Personal Details
personalDetails.subtitle: Manage your personal information and contact details.
personalDetails.workPermitSubtitle: If you are not a Swiss citizen, please provide details of your work permit.

professionalBackground.title: Professional Background
professionalBackground.subtitle: Manage your work experience and education
professionalBackground.educationDescription: Present your education, professional experience, and qualifications.
professionalBackground.qualificationsDescription: Present your education, professional experience, and qualifications.
professionalBackground.workExperienceDescription: Present your education, professional experience, and qualifications.
professionalBackground.descriptionPlaceholder: Briefly describe your responsibilities and achievements...
professionalBackground.name: Name
professionalBackground.issuingBodyPlaceholder: e.g., Swiss Federal Office of Public Health
professionalBackground.noLicensesCertifications: No licenses or certifications added yet.

jobPreferences.title: Job Preferences & Availability
jobPreferences.subtitle: Set your job search preferences and availability to help us find the best matches for you.
jobPreferences.willingToRelocate: I am willing to relocate for the right opportunity
jobPreferences.compensationSubtitle: Setting your target rate helps us match you with appropriate offers. This information remains private.
jobPreferences.workPercentageNotice: Please note that work should not exceed 120% in Switzerland. You are responsible for ensuring compliance with this regulation.

billingInformation.title: Billing Information
billingInformation.hiringInfoMessage: You won't be able to access all services of the platform (hiring, applying, etc.) until these fields are completed.
billingInformation.bankingAccessMessage: For your security, please verify your identity to access banking information.
billingInformation.subtitle: Manage your banking details and billing information for payments.
billingInformation.nonSwiss: I am not a Swiss citizen

documents.title: Documents
documents.subtitle: Securely upload and manage your required documents
documents.selectDocumentTypeFirst: Please select a document type first
documents.cvDescription: Upload your most recent CV or resume. PDF format is preferred.
documents.diplomasDescription: Upload degree certificates for your education qualifications.
documents.licensesDescription: Upload professional licenses and certification documents.
documents.workPermitDescription: If you are not a Swiss citizen, please upload your work permit document.
documents.swissIdWorkPermitDescription: Upload your Swiss ID card (front/back) or work permit document if you are not a Swiss citizen.
documents.referencesDescription: Upload reference letters from previous employers .
documents.otherDescription: Upload any other relevant documents to support your profile.

onboarding.title: Onboarding
onboarding.subtitle: Welcome to InteriMed! Please complete the following steps to get started.
onboarding.recommendedSection: This section is not mandatory but highly recommended to increase your visibility to employers
onboarding.workPermitMandatory: Work permit document is mandatory for non-Swiss citizens
onboarding.completeProfileDesc: Complete all required sections to unlock all features of InteriMed

account.title: Account & Subscription
account.subtitle: Manage your subscription, password, and account settings.
account.securityMessage: Your account is protected with industry-standard security. We recommend using a strong password and enabling two-factor authentication when available.
account.passwordManagementDescription: Update your account password to keep your account secure.

settings.title: Settings & Preferences
settings.subtitle: Customize your platform experience, manage notifications, and control your account settings.
settings.dataSecurityMessage: All your information is encrypted and stored securely in compliance with Swiss data protection laws (nFADP/revDSG) and GDPR. Your privacy is our top priority.
settings.platformSettingsDescription: Configure your availability and working preferences on the platform.
settings.availabilitySettingsDescription: Set your working hours and availability preferences.
settings.notificationPreferencesDescription: Choose how and when you want to receive notifications.
settings.privacySettingsDescription: Control who can see your profile and personal information.
settings.marketplaceSettingsDescription: Manage your visibility and preferences in the job marketplace.
settings.availabilityNotesDescription: Add any additional information about your availability or special requirements.
settings.activeOnMarketplaceDescription: Enable this to be visible to recruiters for long-term positions only. This does not affect your availability for short-term replacements.
settings.saveFailed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.

accountDeletion.confirmMismatch: The confirmation text doesn't match. Please type 'DELETE MY ACCOUNT' exactly.
accountDeletion.success: Your account has been successfully deleted. We're sorry to see you go.
accountDeletion.error: An error occurred while deleting your account
accountDeletion.previewTitle: What happens when you delete your account
accountDeletion.swissLawNotice: Swiss law requires us to retain certain financial and contractual records for 10 years for tax and audit purposes.
accountDeletion.noLegalRecords: Your account has no legal records. All your data will be permanently deleted immediately.
accountDeletion.title: Account Management
accountDeletion.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
accountDeletion.confirmMessage: To confirm deletion, please type 'DELETE MY ACCOUNT' below:
accountDeletion.reauthMessageGoogle: Click the button below to sign in with Google and confirm account deletion.
accountDeletion.reauthMessage: Please enter your password to confirm account deletion.
accountDeletion.subtitle: Manage your account security and deletion
accountDeletion.deleteWarningPermanent: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
